quotes.quote: A great work demands a great sacrifice, and who is not capable of a great sacrifice is not capable of a great work.
Great things start from small beginnings.
Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
A great obstacle to happiness is to anticipate too great a happiness.
Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
The small truth has words that are clear; the great truth has great silence.
None think the great unhappy, but the great.
Where the willingness is great, the difficulties cannot be great.
Lives of great men all remind us, we can make our lives sublime, and, departing, leave behind us, footprints on the sands of time.
Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing.
No great mind has ever existed without a touch of madness.
All great soul-winners have been men of much and mighty prayer, and all great revivals have been preceded and carried out by persevering, prevailing knee-work in the closet.
Great souls by instinct to each other turn, demand alliance, and in friendship burn.
There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
Great men are rarely isolated mountain-peaks; they are the summits of ranges.
There may be a great fire in our soul, yet no one ever comes to warm himself at it, and the passers-by see only a wisp of smoke.
I find the great thing in this world is, not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving.
Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
Half a truth is often a great lie.
A great soul will be strong to live as well as think.
A great soul serves everyone all the time. A great soul never dies. It brings us together again and again.
Great truths are portions of the soul of man; Great souls are portions of eternity.
Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
For a great willpower, no road has length!
Great people are meteors designed to burn so that the earth may be lighted.
Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them.
Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind.
We can do no great things, only small things with great love.
Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
There never was a great soul that did not have some divine inspiration.
